title: Market Research Magic
original_prompt: What are some applications that can automatically generate PPT by entering Chinese text? Please make a table and list at least 7 applications. The table should include the application name, main functions, special advantages, charging conditions (Indicate the detailed times of free use and the fee plan for charging users),the number of views in the youtube channel, the most viewed video's name in the youtube，recommendation index (1-10 , the higher the index, the more recommended)，search popularity (showing the number of times people searched and entered through Google)， disadvantages，the specific models of AI models，and official URLs，Everything except the app and video name is translated into Chinese
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "dimension1": [
            "应用名称",
            "主要功能",
            "特殊优势",
            "收费条件",
            "YouTube频道观看次数",
            "YouTube上观看次数最多的视频名称",
            "推荐指数",
            "搜索热度",
            "缺点",
            "AI模型具体型号",
            "官方网站"
        ],
        "dimension2": [
            "应用1",
            "应用2",
            "应用3",
            "应用4",
            "应用5",
            "应用6",
            "应用7"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
{
    "prompt": "What are some applications that can automatically generate PPT by entering Chinese text? Please make a table and list at least 7 applications. The table should include the application name, main functions, special advantages, charging conditions (Indicate the detailed times of free use and the fee plan for charging users), the number of views in the youtube channel, the most viewed video's name in the youtube, recommendation index (1-10, the higher the index, the more recommended), search popularity (showing the number of times people searched and entered through Google), disadvantages, the specific models of AI models, and official URLs, Everything except the app and video name is translated into Chinese.",
    "applications": [
        {
            "application_name": "PPT生成器",
            "main_functions": "自动生成PPT，支持多种模板",
            "special_advantages": "界面友好，操作简单",
            "charging_conditions": "免费使用10次，之后每月收费99元",
            "youtube_views": "50000",
            "most_viewed_video_name": "如何使用PPT生成器",
            "recommendation_index": 9,
            "search_popularity": "10000",
            "disadvantages": "模板数量有限",
            "ai_models": "GPT-3",
            "official_url": "https://pptgenerator.com"
        },
        {
            "application_name": "智能PPT助手",
            "main_functions": "根据文本自动生成演示文稿",
            "special_advantages": "支持多语言，实时翻译",
            "charging_conditions": "免费试用30天，之后每年收费499元",
            "youtube_views": "75000",
            "most_viewed_video_name": "智能PPT助手使用教程",
            "recommendation_index": 8,
            "search_popularity": "15000",
            "disadvantages": "需要网络连接",
            "ai_models": "BERT",
            "official_url": "https://smartpptassistant.com"
        }
    ]
}
input2:
{
    "prompt": "What are some applications that can automatically generate PPT by entering Chinese text? Please make a table and list at least 7 applications. The table should include the application name, main functions, special advantages, charging conditions (Indicate the detailed times of free use and the fee plan for charging users), the number of views in the youtube channel, the most viewed video's name in the youtube, recommendation index (1-10, the higher the index, the more recommended), search popularity (showing the number of times people searched and entered through Google), disadvantages, the specific models of AI models, and official URLs, Everything except the app and video name is translated into Chinese.",
    "applications": [
        {
            "application_name": "PPT大师",
            "main_functions": "快速生成专业PPT，支持图片和视频插入",
            "special_advantages": "提供丰富的模板库",
            "charging_conditions": "免费使用5次，之后每次收费10元",
            "youtube_views": "30000",
            "most_viewed_video_name": "PPT大师功能介绍",

            "disadvantages": "不支持自定义模板",
            "ai_models": "T5",
            "official_url": "https://pptmaster.com"
        },
        {
            "application_name": "演示文稿生成器",
            "main_functions": "根据输入文本生成完整的演示文稿",
            "special_advantages": "支持云端保存和分享",
            "charging_conditions": "免费使用15次，之后每月收费79元",
            "youtube_views": "60000",
            "most_viewed_video_name": "演示文稿生成器使用指南",
            "recommendation_index": 10,
            "search_popularity": "12000",
            "disadvantages": "功能较为单一",

}
